sect2.para: Implements the function out = in0 times; in1 times; ... times; in(N-1).

sect3.para: Specifies the data type of the inputs and output.

row.entry: Inputs and output are complex values.
Inputs and output are floating point (real) values.
Inputs and output are integer values.
Inputs and output are short integer values.

sect2.sect3:
Num Inputs
Type: intSpecifies the number of inputs. Inputs will be labelled in0 through in(N-1).

Vec Length
Type: intSpecifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
